<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ネットワーク申請">60182f0a836bc6107d79f955eeaad3f5</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>拠点チェック</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var kankyou = g_form.getValue('u_kankyou');
	var kyoten = g_form.getValue('u_kyoten');

	if (kankyou == "kaihatu"){
		if(kyoten == "daiichidc"){
			g_form.addErrorMessage("Test")
		}
	}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-24 05:48:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>45f5501683ab0a107d79f955eeaad31c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>拠点チェック</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="サービスカタログ申請画面イメージ" source="x_1443635_shinsei">423ee3b983af42107d79f955eeaad323</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="サービスカタログ申請画面イメージ">423ee3b983af42107d79f955eeaad323</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_45f5501683ab0a107d79f955eeaad31c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-24 05:48:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
